entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Varennes

entry.title: Saturday: Light snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Light snow beginning near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Light snow. High minus 5.
